FuncDef: The public-key-code begin command displays the edit view of the public key.
Examples: Enter "RSA public key" view, and you can return the system view with "peer-public-key end".
Enter "RSA key code" view, and you can return the last view with "public-key-code end"
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before using this command, you must enters the public key view.After inputting the public-key-code begin command displays the public key edit view, and then input the key characters. Spaces can exist between characters. You can press Enter to continue inputting the key character.The public key configured must be a hex character string coded according to the public key format. It is randomly generated by the client software supporting SSH.The content of a key does not support Chinese characters.
